briefTitle: Diagnostic Utility of MRI in Female Patients With Nipple Discharge: A Prospective Trial
officialTitle: Diagnostic Utility of MRI in Female Patients With Nipple Discharge: A Prospective Trial
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* female patients with unilateral and bloody nipple discharge OR unilateral and clear nipple discharge
* clinical decision to have contrast enhanced MRI

Exclusion Criteria:

* male gender
* non-English speakers
* age \< 21 years
* lack of capacity to give legally effective consent
